Posts.Content: I was diagnosed stage IV breast cancer Fall 2007.  I've had 13 months of chemo and 6 weeks of radiation.  No surgeries.  Am now on Arimidex and Zomata.  Doctor is wanting to change my meds to Femara as my CEA levels are rising.  Scheduled for PET scan on Monday.
Posts.Title: Arimidex and Zomeda and Surgery
